title: banned for no reason
body: I havent touched my account for 12 months come back and its banned. So i message riot and simply get told that my account was found to be using scripts or hacks. I have never once used any type of hack/script on any game let alone 1 that i havent played for nearly a year. In the same email im also told that the account will never be unbanned. So i have lost all the hours and more importantly  $$$$  spent on this game for riot to be unreasonable and not even listening to my reasoning.. do not spend any money on riot u are just a number and they dont care if u have a valid excuse.

replies.body: Thats what i sent the email for it was rufused and the discussion was closed. This is definitely the first time and it wasnt even me.

Please use the "Reply" feature on the boards. Otherwise, I won't get notified of your response.

If you are certain it wasn't you doing this, then you should change your account password to prevent any more tampering immediately. Then, recover your account via support (tell them that it's being used by another person, still have access to it and have proof you owned the account before then). [This page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) will help you a bit.

Unfortunately, time is of the essence in these scenarios, and since it's been a while since your account has been banned (unless you *know* it was very recent) they might not be able to do anything about it.

[This page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201898070-My-Account-is-Suspended) specifically deals with bans. Some significant parts:

>Disciplinary suspensions unrelated to the Leaver Buster System and Tribunal, such as inappropriate summoner name, will vary depending on the specific situation. In these cases, please submit a ticket to Player Support, and we will be happy to provide you with more information about your suspension and how to proceed.
---
>Unfortunately, due to our Privacy Policy, we will not be able to disclose further information regarding Tribunal bans and Leaver Buster suspensions other than what is included in the emails sent to you.
---
You are fully responsible for all activity made on your account. If you believe that your account has been compromised, please see the following Knowledge Base article for more information and instructions to help you recover your account: [Account Recovery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account). We'll be able to address this issue in your ticket.
---
Please see this following Knowledge Base article for more information about how to take further steps to secure your account: [Protecting Your Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account).

tl dr; Read the bloody EULA.
Have you attempted to apply for an appeal? They wouldn't refuse you if this is your first time.
